docs.text: Installation ¶ river is intended to work with Python 3.6 or above . Installation can be done via pip : pip install git+git://github.com/online-ml/river.git@v0.1.0 You can install the latest development version from GitHub as so: pip install git+https://github.com/online-ml/river --upgrade Or, through SSH: pip install git+ssh://git@github.com/online-ml/river.git --upgrade Feel welcome to open an issue on GitHub if you are having any trouble.
docs.title: Installation
